results.name: Binomial transform of A014448.
comment: The binomial transform of this sequence is 2, 8, 42, 248,... = 2*A108404(n).
reference: C. Smith, A Treatise on Algebra, Macmillan, London, 5th ed., 1950, p. 360, Example 44.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000

P. Bhadouria, D. Jhala, B. Singh, Binomial Transforms of the k-Lucas Sequences and its Properties, The Journal of Mathematics and Computer Science (JMCS), Volume 8, Issue 1, Pages 81-92; sequence B_4.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6,-4).
xref: When divided by 2^n this becomes(essentially) A005248.
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 10 2013
